data.name: sqlDataSource1.SelectCommand
data.value:
SELECT CASE WHEN users_jabatan.company_id = 1 THEN users.gol_upah_ap ELSE gol_upah_persero END AS golongan ,SUM(CASE WHEN users.pendidikan_terakhir LIKE 'SLTP%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS pendidikan1 ,SUM(CASE WHEN users.pendidikan_terakhir LIKE 'Diploma I&II' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS pendidikan2 ,SUM(CASE WHEN users.pendidikan_terakhir LIKE 'Diploma III' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS pendidikan3 ,SUM(CASE WHEN users.pendidikan_terakhir LIKE 'Diploma IV' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS pendidikan4 ,SUM(CASE WHEN users.pendidikan_terakhir LIKE 'S1%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS pendidikan5 ,SUM(CASE WHEN users.pendidikan_terakhir LIKE 'S2%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS pendidikan6 ,SUM(CASE WHEN users.pendidikan_terakhir LIKE 'S3%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS pendidikan7 ,COUNT(gol_upah_persero)AS total
FROM users
JOIN users_jabatan ON users.rm_role = users_jabatan.id
WHERE users_jabatan.company_id = @comp_id AND CASE WHEN users_jabatan.company_id = 1 THEN users.gol_upah_ap ELSE gol_upah_persero END <> '-1'
GROUP BY users.gol_upah_persero, users.gol_upah_ap, users_jabatan.company_id
ORDER BY CASE WHEN gol_upah_persero = '0D' THEN 1 WHEN gol_upah_persero = 'P3' THEN 2 WHEN gol_upah_persero = 'P2' THEN 3 WHEN gol_upah_persero = 'P1' THEN 4 WHEN gol_upah_persero= '01' THEN 5 WHEN gol_upah_persero = '02' THEN 6 WHEN gol_upah_persero = '03' THEN 7 WHEN gol_upah_persero = '04' THEN 8 WHEN gol_upah_persero = '05' THEN 9 WHEN gol_upah_persero = '06' THEN 10 WHEN gol_upah_persero = '07' THEN 11 WHEN gol_upah_persero = '08' THEN 11 WHEN gol_upah_persero = '09' THEN 13 WHEN gol_upah_persero = '10' THEN 14 WHEN gol_upah_persero = '11' THEN 15 WHEN gol_upah_persero = '12' THEN 16 WHEN gol_upah_persero = '13' THEN 17 WHEN gol_upah_persero = '14' THEN 18 WHEN gol_upah_persero = '15' THEN 19 WHEN gol_upah_ap = '0D' THEN 1 WHEN gol_upah_ap = 'P3' THEN 2 WHEN gol_upah_ap = 'P2' THEN 3 WHEN gol_upah_ap = 'P1' THEN 4 WHEN gol_upah_ap= '01' THEN 5 WHEN gol_upah_ap = '02' THEN 6 WHEN gol_upah_ap = '03' THEN 7 WHEN gol_upah_ap = '04' THEN 8 WHEN gol_upah_ap = '05' THEN 9 WHEN gol_upah_ap = '06' THEN 10 WHEN gol_upah_ap = '07' THEN 11 WHEN gol_upah_ap = '08' THEN 11 WHEN gol_upah_ap = '09' THEN 13 WHEN gol_upah_ap = '10' THEN 14 WHEN gol_upah_ap = '11' THEN 15 WHEN gol_upah_ap = '12' THEN 16 WHEN gol_upah_ap = '13' THEN 17 WHEN gol_upah_ap = '14' THEN 18 WHEN gol_upah_ap = '15' THEN 19
END

data.name: sqlDataSource2.SelectCommand
data.value:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN users_jabatan.company_id = 1 THEN users.gol_upah_ap ELSE gol_upah_persero END AS golongan ,SUM(CASE WHEN users.pendidikan_terakhir LIKE 'SLTP%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS 'SLTA' ,SUM(CASE WHEN users.pendidikan_terakhir LIKE 'Diploma I&II' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS 'DI' ,SUM(CASE WHEN users.pendidikan_terakhir LIKE 'Diploma III' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS 'DII&III' ,SUM(CASE WHEN users.pendidikan_terakhir LIKE 'Diploma IV' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS 'DIV' ,SUM(CASE WHEN users.pendidikan_terakhir LIKE 'S1%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS 'S1' ,SUM(CASE WHEN users.pendidikan_terakhir LIKE 'S2%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS 'S2' ,SUM(CASE WHEN users.pendidikan_terakhir LIKE 'S3%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS 'S3' ,CASE WHEN CASE WHEN users_jabatan.company_id = 1 THEN users.gol_upah_ap ELSE gol_upah_persero END = '0D' THEN '010D' WHEN CASE WHEN users_jabatan.company_id = 1 THEN users.gol_upah_ap ELSE gol_upah_persero END = 'P3' THEN '02P3' WHEN CASE WHEN users_jabatan.company_id = 1 THEN users.gol_upah_ap ELSE gol_upah_persero END = 'P2' THEN '03P2' WHEN CASE WHEN users_jabatan.company_id = 1 THEN users.gol_upah_ap ELSE gol_upah_persero END = 'P1' THEN '04P1' WHEN CASE WHEN users_jabatan.company_id = 1 THEN users.gol_upah_ap ELSE gol_upah_persero END = '01' THEN '0501' WHEN CASE WHEN users_jabatan.company_id = 1 THEN users.gol_upah_ap ELSE gol_upah_persero END = '02' THEN '0602' WHEN CASE WHEN users_jabatan.company_id = 1 THEN users.gol_upah_ap ELSE gol_upah_persero END ='03' THEN '0703' WHEN CASE WHEN users_jabatan.company_id = 1 THEN users.gol_upah_ap ELSE gol_upah_persero END = '04' THEN '0804' WHEN CASE WHEN users_jabatan.company_id = 1 THEN users.gol_upah_ap ELSE gol_upah_persero END = '05' THEN '0905' WHEN CASE WHEN users_jabatan.company_id = 1 THEN users.gol_upah_ap ELSE gol_upah_persero END = '06' THEN '1006' WHEN CASE WHEN users_jabatan.company_id = 1 THEN users.gol_upah_ap ELSE gol_upah_persero END = '07' THEN '1107' WHEN CASE WHEN users_jabatan.company_id = 1 THEN users.gol_upah_ap ELSE gol_upah_persero END = '08' THEN '1108' WHEN CASE WHEN users_jabatan.company_id = 1 THEN users.gol_upah_ap ELSE gol_upah_persero END = '09' THEN '1309' WHEN CASE WHEN users_jabatan.company_id = 1 THEN users.gol_upah_ap ELSE gol_upah_persero END = '10' THEN '1410' WHEN CASE WHEN users_jabatan.company_id = 1 THEN users.gol_upah_ap ELSE gol_upah_persero END = '11' THEN '1511' WHEN CASE WHEN users_jabatan.company_id = 1 THEN users.gol_upah_ap ELSE gol_upah_persero END = '12' THEN '1612' WHEN CASE WHEN users_jabatan.company_id = 1 THEN users.gol_upah_ap ELSE gol_upah_persero END = '13' THEN '1713' WHEN CASE WHEN users_jabatan.company_id = 1 THEN users.gol_upah_ap ELSE gol_upah_persero END = '14' THEN '1814' ELSE '1915' END AS sorted
FROM users
JOIN users_jabatan ON users.rm_role = users_jabatan.id
WHERE users_jabatan.company_id = @comp_id AND CASE WHEN users_jabatan.company_id = 1 THEN users.gol_upah_ap ELSE gol_upah_persero END <> '-1'
GROUP BY users.gol_upah_persero, users.gol_upah_ap, users_jabatan.company_id
)
AS sourceTable UNPIVOT ( value for category in ([SLTA] , [DI] , [DII&III] , [DIV] , [S1] , [S2] , [S3])
) UNPIV
